strapiPost.title: Peel Museum & Botanical Garden's Hanging Basket Sale Returns
strapiPost.content:
Get ready to brighten up your porch! Peel Museum & Botanical Gardenâ€™s annual Hanging Basket Sale has returned! 

  • Arrangements: Featuring a variety of ferns, greenery, and both shade and sun-loving blooms just in time, these locally-grown baskets are the perfect gift for Mother's Day or any plant lover.
  • Plan ahead: Each basket costs $20, and funds directly support Peel Museum & Botanical Garden in Bentonville. Shoppers can pick up their hanging baskets at Peel Museum & Botanical Garden (400 S. Walton Blvd) May 5-6 from 8-10a, or May 7 from 10a-12p. 

Click HERE to pre-purchase your basket today.
